description: Gumroad simplifies selling digital goods, physical products, and memberships by offering a streamlined checkout, marketing tools, and direct payout options

capabilities.name: GUMROAD_GET_RESOURCE_SUBSCRIPTIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to show all active subscriptions of the user for the input resource. Use when you need to review existing webhooks before adding a new one.

capabilities.name: GUMROAD_GET_SALES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all successful sales by the authenticated user. Use when you need to list your Gumroad sales, optionally filtering by email, date range, product, or pagination.

capabilities.name: GUMROAD_GET_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve the authenticated user's data. Use when you need the current user's profile details after authentication.

capabilities.name: GUMROAD_SUBSCRIBE_TO_RESOURCE
capabilities.description: Tool to subscribe to a resource. Use when you need to receive real-time event webhooks after creating your webhook endpoint.

capabilities.name: GUMROAD_UNSUBSCRIBE_FROM_RESOURCE
capabilities.description: Tool to unsubscribe from a resource. Use after verifying the subscription ID exists to remove webhook.
